docTitle.titlePart:
Derivation of Yang – Mills equations from Maxwell Equations and Exact
solutions

byline.affiliation:
Mathematics Department, College of Science and Information Technology,
Zarqa University

front.div:
Abstract
In this paper we derived the Yang-Mills equations from Maxwell equations. Consequently we find a new form for self-
duality equations. In addition exact solution class of the classical SU(2) Yang-Mills field equations in four-dimensional
Euclidean space and two exact solution classes for SU(2) Yang-Mills equations when is í µí¼ a complex analytic function are
also obtained.
front.keyword: Keywords : Self-dual SU(2); Yang-Mills fields; Gauge theory

Journal: Journal of Advances in Mathematics
Vol 4, No 1
